urls.description: Routes requests across all available clusters globally
urls.warn: Always use the 'polling_url' returned in responses when using this endpoint

urls.description: Multi-cluster routing limited to EU regions
urls.warn: Does not support finetuning and finetuned inference

urls.description: Multi-cluster routing limited to US regions
urls.warn: Does not support finetuning and finetuned inference
Required for finetuning and finetuned inference operations in EU region
Required for finetuning and finetuned inference operations in US region

description: Our API endpoints enable media creation with BFL models. It follows an asynchronous design, where you first make a request for a generation and then query for the result of your request.
